message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value for your business. To start the conversation, I'm proposing a price of $1,100,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $900,000 is below its true value. I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,050,000. This reflects the product's immense potential for your business.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $950,000. This is the highest price I'm willing to pay for the product.

Bob, I understand we're both trying to find a fair deal. I'm willing to consider a final offer of $1,000,000. This is a significant compromise on my end, reflecting my desire to see this product benefit your business.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $950,000, but I need to see some more movement from you. I'm not willing to go any higher than this.
